description: BLOCKER: Resolve `npm`/`npm` inconsistency across ALL docs. _Update `.rules.md`, `README.md`, `CONTRIBUTING.md`_
Align `README.md` "Tools Documentation" table with actual `TODO.md` status. _Reflect reality, don't overstate features_
Consolidate duplicate UI components in `amazon-seller-tools`. _Code Cleanup_
Remove unused utility functions from `lib` directory. _Code Cleanup_
Improve readability and maintainability of seller tools code. _Code Cleanup_
Optimize image loading and rendering (Initial pass). _Foundational performance_
Update `next-themes` to support React 19 and remove `--legacy-peer-deps` workaround. _Resolve peer dependency conflict documented in WORKAROUND.md_
Implement `ScaleWithWesley` Branding (Logo, Favicon, Theme). _Integrate visual identity_
Configure Domain/Hosting for `scalewithwesley.com`. _Ensure Vercel setup is correct_
Rebrand/Enhance existing Blog component & styling. _Align with brand, ensure MDX features robust_
Setup Newsletter Platform & Frontend Signup Form Component. _Choose provider (Substack, etc.), build UI_
Implement `POST /api/newsletter/subscribe` Endpoint. _Backend for newsletter signup_
Create initial Blog Posts for _functional_ Seller Tools. _Explain value/usage of ready tools_
Add initial User Guides for functional Amazon seller tools. _Basic "how-to" for users_
Create API documentation for `/api/newsletter/subscribe`. _Document the first API endpoint_
Implement core PPC Campaign Auditor functionality. _Needed for content/core value_
Enhance Keyword Analyzer with trend data (core functionality). _Needed for content/core value_
Improve calculation algorithms for keyword analysis. _Ensure core tool logic is sound_
Add initial Unit Tests for core Seller Tool logic. _Start building test coverage_
Add Links to Social Media/Newsletter Signup (Footer, etc.). _Promote channels_
Implement consistent Dark Mode support across site. _Part of branding/UI polish_
Create core `ScaleWithWesley` Social Media Profiles (LinkedIn). _Establish online presence_
Implement enhanced data visualization for seller tools. _Charts, graphs for better insights_
Add robust data export functionality (CSV/Excel) for tools. _Core feature for tool usability_
Enhance global error handling and user feedback mechanisms. _Improve UX, especially for tool errors_
Add robust input validation for all seller tools. _Prevent errors, ensure data integrity_
Add E2E tests for critical user flows (tool usage, signup). _Ensure key paths work reliably_
Create blog posts for newly completed/enhanced Seller Tools. _Expand content library_
Start regular Newsletter/Social Media activity. _Share content, engage audience_
Install Zod dependency for roadmap validation. _(Roadmap Display Feature)_
Define Zod schema (roadmapSchema.ts) for roadmap task structure. _(Roadmap Display Feature)_
Adapt TODO.md data or create mechanism to provide roadmap data as JSON for display component. _(Roadmap Display Feature)_
Create RoadmapDisplay React component (fetches, validates, groups, renders roadmap data). _(Roadmap Display Feature)_
Add CSS styling for the RoadmapDisplay component. _(Roadmap Display Feature)_
Integrate RoadmapDisplay component into a relevant page (e.g., /roadmap or /about). _(Roadmap Display Feature)_
Implement Authentication & Authorization (if needed). _Enables user accounts, saved data, etc._
Define & Implement LinkedIn Integration (Purpose-Driven). _E.g., Display posts, Login (Requires Auth - ID 9)_
Define & Implement other APIs as needed (e.g., Contact Form). _Build APIs based on specific feature requirements_
Implement usage tracking for tools. _Understand feature popularity_
Implement error tracking and reporting (e.g., Sentry). _Proactive issue detection_
Add Redis caching for API responses (if needed). _Optimize frequently accessed data_
Add rate limiting for API endpoints. _Protect backend resources_
Add bulk processing capabilities for keyword analysis. _Advanced tool feature_
Implement progressive image loading / advanced optimizations. _Fine-tune performance_
Add support for multiple languages in seller tools. _Internationalization (i18n)_
Add support for multiple currencies in seller tools. _Localization (l10n)_
Project structure and base configuration.
Basic component library setup.
Next.js app router implementation.
Complete ACOS Calculator implementation.
Implement responsive design for all tools.
Implement API key rotation and management.
